definition[0]: to move up through the air
definition[1]: to climb something or move to a higher position
example[1]: Without a word, he began to ascend the stairs.
explanation[0]: Ascend is used mostly in literary or technical contexts. In everyday English, people usually say climb or go up:
example[2]: We started to climb the mountain.
example[3]: She slowly went up the stairs.
definition[2]: to lead up to a higher position
example[4]: The road ascends steeply from the harbour.
definition[3]: to move to a more important or powerful job
example[5]: The number of women decreases as you ascend the professional hierarchy.
